mapper.insert: insert into notice values( 0, #{notice_title}, 0, #{notice_content}, now(), now() );
mapper.select:
SELECT nm.notice_code, nm.notice_title, nm.user_code,
um.user_name,
nm.notice_content, nm.create_date FROM notice_mst nm LEFT OUTER JOIN user um ON(um.user_code = nm.user_code) where
nm.notice_code = #{notice_code}
nm.notice_code = ( select max(notice_code) from notice_mst where notice_code < #{notice_code} )
nm.notice_code = ( select min(notice_code) from notice_mst where notice_code > #{notice_code} )

select nm.notice_code, nm.notice_title, um.user_name, nm.create_date, nm.notice_count, (select count(*) from notice_mst nm left outer join user um on(um.user_code = nm.user_code)
where nm.notice_title like concat('%', #{search_value}, '%')
where nm.notice_title like concat('%', #{search_value}, '%') or nm.notice_content like concat('%', #{search_value}, '%')
where um.user_id like concat('%', #{search_value}, '%')
) as total_notice_count from notice_mst nm left outer join user um on(um.user_code = nm.user_code)
where nm.notice_title like concat('%', #{search_value}, '%')
where nm.notice_title like concat('%', #{search_value}, '%') or nm.notice_content like concat('%', #{search_value}, '%')
where um.user_name like concat('%', #{search_value}, '%')
order by nm.notice_code desc limit #{index}, 10;
